content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: variable_name
      operator: longer_than
      value: 8
Core:
  Id: CORE-000182
  Version: '1'
  Status: Published
Description: Raise an error when variable name length is greater than 8.
Outcome:
  Message: Variable name length is greater than 8.
Rule Type: Variable Metadata Check
Sensitivity: Variable
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0310
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: In some cases, the standard variable name will be
                  shortened to meet the 8-character variable name requirement...
                Document: IG v3.4
                Section: 4.2.8.3
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - ALL
  Domains:
    Include:
      - ALL

json.Description: Raise an error when variable name length is greater than 8.

Outcome.Message: Variable name length is greater than 8.

Citations.Cited_Guidance: In some cases, the standard variable name will be shortened to meet the 8-character variable name requirement...
